Name

Crit Effect

Type
Skull Crush The target is stupefied 3 until healed.

Bludgeoning
hand Wound Until healed, the target is clumsy 2 and can't use one of its hands (determined randomly by the GM).

Piercing
Broad Swipe The target takes 1d4 persistent bleed damage.

Slashing
Lingering Damage The target takes 1d6 persistent damage of the same type as the bomb or spell's damage.

Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #28
